entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,525Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 60

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcases in the living room. Beside the photo, in thick marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back out of pure spite. But in the corner, tiny letters catch his eye: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does.The next page has the present date scribbled in the corner and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone.I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest.Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf.We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. Derek runs a thumb over it in disbelief.---What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: Better Than Pretend
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,219Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 65

Summary: Derek didn’t plan on telling Stiles he’d be his date to his cousin’s wedding. After everything he’d lost, hope felt like a dangerous lie.From awkward breakfasts to clumsy dance lessons, Stiles keeps closing the distance, slowly breaking down Derek’s carefully guarded defenses.Pretending to be a couple doesn’t just blur the line between fake and real. It makes Derek confront the part of himself that stopped believing he could ever have something good, especially someone like Stiles.

entry.title: Casus Belli
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,569Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 154

Summary: “I’m supposed to take care of you,” Derek started.“Shut up,” Stiles stated with no heat. He looked up at Derek. “When are you going to get it that I like taking care of you too?”Derek weakly shook his head. “I’m not good enough, Stiles.”Stiles’ features sunk. “Don’t I get to decide that?” He stood, dropping the towel he had been using to help move the blanket. “Just… get in bed, Derek. We can talk later.”Derek remembered touching Stiles’ wrist. “I should have died that night we met.”“Not when I have anything to do with it,” Stiles replied.~*~The one where "touch him and die" is a promise both Derek and Stiles live by

entry.title: Pack Scent
entry.summary:
Author: theauthoress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,546Chapters: 10/12Kudos: 1,126

Summary: “What’s going on?”Scott made a strange, whiny noise at the back of his throat that made him sound a little like a kicked puppy. “Your scent.” He pulled on Stiles’s hoodie until their noses were practically touching.“Scott, buddy, you’re going to have to be more specific.” Stiles rubbed a circle on the back of Scott’s hand with his thumb. “You know I don’t have werewolf senses.”“You smell like… like…” Scott fumbled for words, his brow furrowed deeply. His eyes started to look a little wet, and that was something Stiles could not deal with.“Hey, hey, it’s okay. I’m okay. Just tell me what’s wrong and we’ll fix it. I’ll—I dunno—shower really good, I promise.”“You smell like something claimed you,” Scott finally said in a horrified whisper.

entry.title: LIKE THE COMING OF SPRING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,613Chapters: 36/36Kudos: 4

Summary: Three months after leaving to attend Berkeley, Stiles receives a phone call. Twelve years later; Stiles and Derek's son, Eli, is eager to help when a new enemy emerges. The nemeton has been quieted, but things never remain silent forever. When a demonic force threatens the peace in Beacon Hills, the Hale pack must prove that they are stronger than ever.Or;You are in the backyard, lying in the grass. The sun is high and hot. The light is painting the darkness behind your eyes into a vermillion. “You know what you have to do, right?” Laura asks. Last you saw she was filling a wading pool, but the water has stopped running through the hose and as she moves you can hear it sloshing around her shins.“No clue,” you answer. Laura laughs. You've missed that sound so much, and it makes you think about how long it took you after your family died to laugh again. “Last time we spoke you said my grief was too quiet… but it's been a while since I lost anyone.”You hear the water slosh two more times as she steps out of the pool. She walks over to you and stands so close to your arm that you can feel how cold the water is from her feet.“Who says grief must be fresh to be felt?”

entry.title: To Build A Life
entry.summary:
Author: SeaKell2004

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,018Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 46

Summary: Derek Hale is a California State Trooper. Stiles Stilinski is a Sheriff’s Deputy. They’d never met—until a string of arsons brings them together. What begins as banter between two men who can’t stop noticing each other slowly becomes love, then marriage, then family.

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,907Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Theo has been living in the McCall house since Sheriff Stillinski found out the chimera was homeless, what happens when one Scott McCall comes home for summer break from college and finds out that they may have seriously miss judged the chimera. ora text fic of the McCall pack finding out things about Theo that makes them see the chimera in a whole new light.
